scenario.name: UAC REGISTER + INVITE + call
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[field3]@[field4] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:[field0]@[field4]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field3]@[field4]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 100 User-Agent: SIPp/erik Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

ACK sip:[field3]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0]@[field4]>;tag=[call_number] [last_To:] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 100 Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[field3]@[field4] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:[field0]@[field4]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field3]@[field4]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> [field2] Max-Forwards: 100 User-Agent: SIPp/erik Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

ACK [next_url] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0]@[field4]>;tag=[call_number] [last_To:] [routes] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 100 Content-Length: 0

BYE [next_url] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0]@[field4]>;tag=[call_number] [last_To:] [routes] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 100 Content-Length: 0
